message: I'm excited to offer you this great product for $14000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you, and it's a great opportunity for you to own it at a good price.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $11000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13000. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you and my minimum price for it.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $12200. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the value you're placing on it.

I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, but I'm not willing to go above $13000. I'm willing to compromise at $12800. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you and my minimum price for it.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $12500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the value you're placing on it.
